name: Miratope
description: A renderer for polytopes. Still in alpha.

scripts._bbu-win: echo Running Browserify + Babelify + Uglify... & browserify src/js/main.js -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] ] | uglifyjs -c toplevel,sequences=true,conditionals=true,booleans=true,if_return=true,join_vars=true,drop_console=true -m > out/main.js & echo Browserify + Babelify + Uglify Done!
scripts._b-win: echo Running Browserify... & browserify src/js/main.js -o out/main.js --debug & echo Browserify Done!
scripts._c-win: echo Copying index.html to the project root folder... & copyfiles -u 1 src/index.html ./ & echo Copying Done!
scripts._h-win: echo Running HTMLMinifier... & html-minifier --input-dir src --output-dir ./ --file-ext html --minify-js true --minify-css true --minify-urls true --remove-comments --collapse-whitespace & echo HTMLMinifier [main page] Done!
scripts._htypedoc-win: echo Running HTMLMinifier... & html-minifier --input-dir out/typedoc --output-dir out/typedoc --file-ext html --minify-js true --minify-css true --minify-urls true --remove-comments --collapse-whitespace & echo HTMLMinifier [docs] Done!
scripts.build-win: npm run tsc-win & npm run _bbu-win & npm run _h-win
scripts.debug-win: npm run tsc-win & npm run _b-win & npm run _c-win
scripts.typedoc-win: echo Running TypeDoc... & typedoc src/ts & npm run _htypedoc-win
scripts.eslint-win: echo Running ESLint... & eslint src/ts/**/*.ts{,x} --fix & echo ESLint Done!
scripts.tsc-win: echo Running TypeScript... & tsc & echo TypeScript Done!
scripts.fullbuild-win: npm run eslint-win & npm run build-win & npm run typedoc-win
